author: @lacapital
title: Javier Milei reiter√≥ su apoyo inalterable al pueblo jud√≠o en la inauguraci√≥n de los Juegos Macabeos 2023
text: El presidente Javier Milei ratific√≥ este jueves su "compromiso inalterable" con el pueblo jud√≠o "en la lucha contra el terrorismo isl√°mico", al participar de la inauguraci√≥n de los Juegos Macabeos Panamericanos en Buenos Aires 2023. El presidente Javier Milei ratific√≥ este jueves su "compromiso inalterable" con el pueblo jud√≠o "en la lucha contra el terrorismo isl√°mico", al participar de la inauguraci√≥n de los Juegos Macabeos Panamericanos en Buenos Aires 2023. "Hoy Argentina vuelve a ser sede de los Juegos Macabeos, despu√©s de 16 a√±os", destac√≥ Milei desde el Movistar Arena, en el barrio porte√±o de Villa Crespo, donde valor√≥ este evento como "una verdadera congregaci√≥n del pueblo jud√≠o". Acompa√±ado por la vicepresidenta, Victoria Villarruel; la secretaria general de la presidencia, Karina Milei; la ministra de Seguridad, Patricia Bullrich; y el jefe de Gobierno porte√±o, Jorge Macri, el primer mandatario resalt√≥ el rol de "la sana competencia" del deporte, donde "nos ponemos a prueba y nos exigimos". "Al sacrificio y la pasi√≥n le corresponde tarde o temprano una recompensa, pero tambi√©n es el √°mbito donde aprendemos a convivir con el adversario, en el deporte y en todos los √≥rdenes de la vida", indic√≥ Milei frente a unas 8 mil personas, entre competidores que ven√≠an de distintos lugares del mundo, familiares y amantes del deporte. En esa l√≠nea, record√≥ una de sus frases de cabecera durante la campa√±a electoral: "No vine a guiar corderos, sino a despertar leones. Veo en los Juegos Macabeos este esp√≠ritu de excelencia y de coraje". "La historia de Macabeos es para m√≠ muy importante. Eran los menos contra los muchos, los d√©biles contra los poderosos, pero vencieron porque la victoria en combate depende de las fuerzas del cielo", afirm√≥. >> Leer m√°s: [Milei: "Si me rechazan el DNU llamar√≠a a un plebicito o consulta popular"](https://www.lacapital.com.ar/politica/milei-si-me-rechazan-el-dnu-llamaria-un-plebicito-o-consulta-popular-n10109807.html) Milei envi√≥ su "cari√±o sentido a todo el pueblo jud√≠o y en particular a quienes tienen seres queridos cerca de la l√≠nea de combate" y ratific√≥ su "compromiso inalterable con el pueblo jud√≠o en la lucha contra el terrorismo isl√°mico". Para cerrar, alz√≥ la voz con su cl√°sico "Viva la libertad, carajo", que fue seguido por cantos de aliento del p√∫blico. Al concluir los aplausos para el presidente, se entonaron los himnos de Argentina e Israel, mientras se sosten√≠an sobre el escenario las banderas de todas las delegaciones participantes. .

author: CNA
title: Tabloid publisher say he worked to suppress sex stories, at Trump trial - CNA
text:
NEW YORK: Former National Enquirer publisher David Pecker testified at Donald Trump's criminal trial on Thursday (Apr 25) that he wrangled with Trump and his former lawyer ahead of the 2016 election over who should buy the silence of women who said they had sexual encounters with him.
Pecker's second day of testimony provided further evidence that he worked as Trump's "eyes and ears" to suppress stories which could have hurt the businessman-turned-politician's presidential bid at a time when he was facing multiple accusations of sexual misbehaviour.
New York prosecutors have charged Trump with falsifying business records to cover up that activity, which they say corrupted the election. Trump has pleaded not guilty. Pecker does not face charges.
Pecker, 72, testified that American Media, the Enquirer's owner, paid to buy the stories of former Playboy model Karen McDougal, who said she had an affair with Trump in 2006 and 2007, and a former Trump Tower doorman who said Trump fathered an illegitimate child, which turned out not to be true.
The tabloid did not run either story but ensured that rivals would not publish them either - a practice known as "catch and kill". Pecker said the newspaper spent hundreds of thousands of dollars over the years to buy stories involving prominent people, including movie star Arnold Schwarzenegger and golfer Tiger Woods.
Pecker said he alerted Trump's lawyer Michael Cohen when he heard that porn star Stormy Daniels was looking to sell her story of a 2006 sexual encounter with Trump for US$120,000 in the weeks before the election. Related: In Trump hush money trial, tabloid publisher testifies he helped candidacy Pecker said he was not interested in paying Daniels at that point because he had already paid for the other stories.
"I thought it should come off the market, and if anyone was going to buy it, Michael Cohen and Donald Trump should buy it," Pecker said."
Pecker said Cohen pressed him to buy Daniels' story, but Pecker testified he did not want to be involved with a porn star.
Cohen has said he ultimately paid Daniels US$130,000 to stay silent and was reimbursed US$420,000 by Trump after the election. Trump faces 34 felony counts of falsifying business records for labelling his payments to Cohen as legal fees.
Before that, Pecker testified, American Media bought McDougal's story and signed an agreement to use a shell company to secretly sell it on to Trump.
Pecker said he called off the deal after speaking with a company lawyer.
"Michael Cohen said, 'The boss is going to be very angry with you.' And I said, 'I'm sorry, I'm not going forward, the deal is off,'" Pecker testified.
"He was very angry, very upset, screaming, basically, at me," Pecker said of Cohen.
Pecker said Trump was angered when Pecker allowed McDougal to speak to news media after the Wall Street Journal revealed the hush money deal. People march as they protest against former U.S. President Donald Trump during his hush money trial, near the Manhattan Criminal Court in New York City on Apr 25, 2024. (Photo: REUTERS/Eduardo Munoz/TPX IMAGES OF THE DAY) "He was very upset. He couldn‚Äôt understand why I did it,‚Äù Pecker testified.
McDougal is expected to testify later in the trial.
Trump has denied having sex with Daniels, whose real name is Stephanie Clifford, and McDougal.
Hush money payments themselves are not illegal, and Trump's lawyers have argued the Daniels payout was personal and unrelated to his campaign.
Prosecutors say the payment was a campaign expense that should have been disclosed, and that Trump‚Äôs arrangement with the Enquirer deceived voters by suppressing stories of alleged extramarital affairs at a time when he faced accusations of sexual misbehaviour. Related: US Supreme Court to hear arguments on presidential immunity in Trump cases "ELECTORAL FRAUD" Pecker testified that he did not notify federal election officials of the McDougal payment, even though he knew that campaign expenditures made in coordination with candidates must be reported.
The Enquirer's editor, Dylan Howard, appeared to be aware of the conflict as well. "At least if he wins, I'll be pardoned for electoral fraud," Howard said in a text message prosecutors have asked to show jurors.
American Media admitted to campaign finance violations in 2018 in a deal with the Justice Department that averted prosecution and required them to cooperate with the probe.
The trial is the first of a former US president and carries political risks for Trump as he prepares for a November election rematch with President Joe Biden and fends off three other criminal indictments, to which he has also pleaded not guilty.
As Trump watched Pecker testify in New York, the US Supreme Court heard Trump's arguments that he is immune from prosecution for actions taken as president. Justice Juan Merchan denied Trump's request to attend the Supreme Court arguments.
Merchan has imposed a limited gag order on Trump that bars him from publicly attacking witnesses, jurors and other people close to the case, including court staff and their families.
Merchan has not yet ruled on a request by prosecutors to punish Trump for violating that order.
Trump has said the gag order violates his right to free speech and says he is being treated unfairly by Merchan.
Source: AFP/fs Related Topics Donald Trump trial Advertisement Also worth reading Content is loading... Advertisement Expand to read the full story Get bite-sized news via a new
cards interface. Give it a try. Click here to return to FAST Tap here to return to FAST FAST

author: L. Carpenter
title: ¬øC√≥mo han convertido las adolescentes la medicina est√©tica en algo tan habitual como ir a la peluquer√≠a?
text:
La obsesi√≥n por los rellenos
Secciones
Servicios
Destacamos
Edici√≥n
La obsesi√≥n por los rellenos
Jueves, 30 de Enero 2025, 12:39h
Tiempo de lectura: 5 min
El relleno de labios se ha convertido en un complemento de moda m√°s. Hay chicas de 17 a√±os que encuentran perfectamente natural querer que les hagan un relleno, tan natural como querer comprarse un bolso. Y es que la generaci√≥n Z considera que recurrir a la medicina est√©tica es tan normal como ir a la peluquer√≠a¬ª. As√≠ habla el doctor Nick Milojevic, que dirige la Milo Clinic en Harley Street de Londres, y lo hace alarmado por las imprudencias que muchas chicas j√≥venes cometen con los rellenos, cuya demanda se ha disparado estimulada por redes sociales tan centradas en la imagen como Instagram. A ello se suma que hay ya en el mercado nuevos productos como un √°cido hialur√≥nico que se disuelve con el tiempo y cuyos efectos pueden ser revertidos si surge alguna complicaci√≥n o los resultados son excesivos. En otras palabras, los rellenos han perdido toda connotaci√≥n de permanencia y ya nadie se los toma como una medida dr√°stica.
En el Reino Unido, el asunto ocupa las portadas de los medios por la cantidad de chicas que se someten a estos tratamientos... y no siempre de forma segura. El doctor Louis Sebagh, propietario de cl√≠nicas en Londres y Par√≠s, lo explica as√≠: ¬´En este momento tenemos nuevas herramientas y nueva clientela. Hasta ahora, el objetivo principal era ralentizar el proceso de envejecimiento y evitar las operaciones quir√∫rgicas. Sin embargo, ahora hay chicas de 18 a√±os que no est√°n interesadas en contener ese envejecimiento, sino en conseguir la transformaci√≥n f√≠sica.
Lo que quieren son p√≥mulos m√°s altos y labios m√°s gruesos. Las j√≥venes tienen una percepci√≥n de las caras completamente diferente. Se presentan acompa√±adas por sus madres y vienen pertrechadas con la versi√≥n facial que han creado en el tel√©fono m√≥vil. Est√°n sometidas a muchas presiones. Se sienten insatisfechas con su apariencia f√≠sica porque viven sometidas al diario bombardeo de im√°genes, y por eso quieren que las ayude¬ª.
Sebagh a√±ade: ¬´Las propias madres se ven sometidas a las presiones de sus hijas. Es frecuente que estas muchachas recurran a soluciones m√°s baratas y terminen con los labios recauchutados por alguien que no tiene experiencia o titulaci√≥n m√©dica. La situaci√≥n actual recuerda al Salvaje Oeste. Hay un mont√≥n de cowboys que van por libre y hacen rellenos sin estar cualificados¬ª.
El caso de Emily ‚Äìde 18 a√±os‚Äì es revelador. Seg√∫n reconoce, es adicta al aumento de labios. Emily explica que desde siempre sent√≠a la necesidad de tener una cara comparable a las de las influencers que ve en Instagram. Emily empez√≥ a hacerse rellenos de labios en febrero del a√±o pasado, cuando a√∫n ten√≠a 17 a√±os. Estaba paseando con una amiga y se fij√≥ en el cartel pegado a la puerta de una peluquer√≠a. Entr√≥, dijo tener 18 a√±os en el formulario que le hicieron rellenar y concert√≥ una visita para la semana siguiente. Volvi√≥ con una serie de fotos de Instagram.
Quien la atendi√≥ le explic√≥ algunos de los riesgos, indic√≥ que por el momento no pod√≠a aumentarle los labios en tanta medida como ella quer√≠a y le cobr√≥ 180 libras esterlinas (unos 195 euros) por un relleno de un mililitro. El hombre en ning√∫n momento le exigi√≥ ver un documento de identidad que confirmara sus a√±os. ¬´Me salieron unos moratones enormes ‚Äìrecuerda Emily‚Äì, pero el resultado fue fant√°stico¬ª. Su madre repar√≥ en la hinchaz√≥n y se qued√≥ horrorizada. ¬´Pero la sesi√≥n me la hab√≠a pagado yo con un dinero que me hab√≠a sacado trabajando los s√°bados. Le dije que tendr√≠a que aguantarse¬ª, reconoce Emily.
Emily se propuso obtener un nuevo relleno y fue a un sal√≥n de belleza en el centro de Londres. Volvi√≥ a mentir en el formulario y esta vez pag√≥ un poco menos: 144 libras (155 euros). Dos meses despu√©s, en agosto, volvi√≥ a este mismo lugar y se hizo un nuevo aumento. Ahora se ha dado cuenta de que ¬´es una adicci√≥n como cualquier otra. Te miras en el espejo y quieres m√°s y m√°s... Es una espiral sin fin¬ª.
En lo referente a la regulaci√≥n, la normativa brit√°nica sobre rellenos d√©rmicos es acaso una de las que peores controles tiene en Europa. En Espa√±a hay m√°s control. Seg√∫n el dermat√≥logo Agust√≠n Viera ¬´la infiltraci√≥n de rellenos y toxina botul√≠nica se consideran actos m√©dicos¬ª. Es decir, ¬´que deben ser realizados por un m√©dico titulado y capacitado en un centro con todas las autorizaciones sanitarias exigidas en cada comunidad aut√≥noma¬ª. Por eso, el doctor aconseja que el paciente exija un informe donde se indique no solo el diagn√≥stico y los productos utilizados, sino tambi√©n el n√∫mero de registro de esos productos.
Los rellenos presentan peligros. En caso de ser inyectados en una arteria pueden causar necrosis: la piel muere y aparecen marcadas cicatrices. Adem√°s, si un relleno d√©rmico se infiltra en una arteria que alimenta el ojo, puede provocar ceguera (motivo por el que los cirujanos oculares han de seguir unos cursos especiales). Todos los expertos exigen un mayor control sobre este tipo de procedimientos que programas como el de las Kardashian y los reality shows han popularizado hasta extremos inquietantes.

author: Cnn
title: More monster waves will collide with the California coast after injuring onlookers and causing serious flooding
text:
More monster waves will collide with the California coast after injuring onlookers and causing serious flooding
CNN, KCAL, KCBS
By Elizabeth Wolfe, Robert Shackelford, Mary Gilbert and Cindy Von Quednow, CNN
(CNN) ‚Äî A series of powerful storms in the Pacific Ocean are
driving towering waves into the California coastline, triggering flooding and posing a significant risk to people and structures along the coast.
Monstrous, 20-foot-plus waves on Thursday crashed over seawalls and swept away and injured several people, forced rescues and sent a damaging surge of water through coastal California streets.
A brief dip in wave heights may occur in some locations along the California coast during the daytime Friday as one storm pushes ashore, but the danger will quickly ramp back up later Friday and Saturday as another system develops behind it.
‚ÄúOverall, this is expected to be an exceptional high-surf and coastal flooding event that has not occurred in many years,‚Äù the weather service in Los Angeles warned.
Sea levels have risen along most of the California coastline over the past century, NOAA data shows, as global temperature climbs and melts glaciers and ice sheets. Higher sea levels are making coastal flooding events worse and will continue to do so in the future.
Waves as high as telephone poles ‚Äì about 40 feet ‚Äì could slam into San Francisco through Friday morning. Fifteen- to 20-foot waves are expected along the central and Southern California coasts through Saturday evening.
The first round of dangerous waves hit alongside high tide Thursday morning. Several people were injured by a huge wave that slammed into Ventura Beach.
The wave crashed over a barrier along the Southern California beach, tossing a wall of fast-moving water at a group of onlookers who rushed to escape the deluge, witness video shows. Seawater quickly knocked some people off their feet and pummeled cars as drivers tried to speed away.
Nearly 20 people were briefly swept away in the incident and eight people were taken to the hospital, Ventura officials said.
High water and dangerous rip currents will churn along some of California‚Äôs beaches through the weekend as much of the West coast ‚Äì spanning from the US-Mexico border to southern Oregon ‚Äì is under coastal flood and high-surf alerts, the National Weather Service said.
The dangerous conditions pose an ‚Äúexceptional risk‚Äù of ocean drowning and damage to structures like piers and jetties, the National Weather Service said.
The dangerous wave risk will lessen on Saturday for Northern California, but continue in southern Oregon and rival Thursday‚Äôs impact in Southern California. The Ventura County coast, along with Hermosa, Manhattan and Palos Verdes beaches face the most extreme surf and are at risk for significant coastal flooding.
One of the storms helping to drive the waves will also bring rain and wind to California through Saturday. High wind alerts are in effect for California‚Äôs central coast and the Bay Area on Friday as wind gusts of up to 50 mph are expected. These strong wind gusts will churn up waters even further.
The spectacular waters have enthralled some surfers and onlookers, but weather officials are cautioning that the waves and strong rip tides can be perilous for those nearby.
‚ÄúLarge breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore,‚Äù the National Weather Service warned.
At least one fisherman fell overboard in a harbor off Oxnard Thursday and later came ashore uninjured, the Ventura County Fire Department said.
The conditions caused some road closures and evacuations in coastal California communities Thursday and prompted the rescue of five campers along the San Luis Obispo coast.
Crews in Ventura worked through the night to reinforce a mile-long sand barrier that was damaged by powerful waters on Thursday, the local fire department said. Standing about 7 feet tall, the raised wall helps protect beachside communities.
Hoping to discourage spectators, local officials closed a main access point to Ventura Pier, which saw a swell of about 20 feet on Thursday. Some coastal streets in the area have also been closed as a precaution.
In central California‚Äôs Santa Cruz, the sheriff‚Äôs office
issued an evacuation warning for some areas on Thursday, which included areas of Rio Del Mar, where seawater filled beachside roadways and pushed against some homes, CNN affiliate KION reported. The warnings were lifted later in the day.
Massive waves attract surfers to Mavericks
Despite safety warnings, the massive waves are a welcome sight to surfers hungry to tackle the legendary swells at Mavericks Beach, about 25 miles south of San Francisco.
Pro surfers and spectators flocked to the beach on Thursday for a competition at the site known for having
some of the biggest waves in the world, CNN affiliate KGO reported.
Local resident Ion Banner
told the affiliate that surfers from Brazil, Tahiti and Hawaii were out in the water. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs pretty gnarly, it‚Äôs super big,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúThe waves looked absolutely massive and it was everything that we expected,‚Äù said Miguel Blanco, who told KGO he flew in from Portugal to surf the waves. ‚ÄúIt was really big, I‚Äôd say 40-60 foot waves.‚Äù
Mavericks‚Äô jaw-dropping waves ‚Äì caused by unique underwater rock formations ‚Äì reach their biggest heights in the winter, when big wave surfers from all over the world make pilgrimages to face the swells.
The legendary waves and the surfers who brave them have been the subject of several films and documentaries, including the 2012 biopic ‚ÄúChasing Mavericks‚Äù about American surfer Jay Moriarity‚Äôs journey to surf Mavericks as a teen.
On Thursday, the conditions were prime for surfers like Blanco.
‚ÄúIf it‚Äôs your turn, you just gotta go,‚Äù Blanco said. ‚ÄúWhen you see a big wave, you‚Äôre kinda scared but at the same time you‚Äôre feeling like you should go and you just go and enjoy the ride.‚Äù
CNN‚Äôs David Williams contributed to this report.
The-CNN-Wire
‚Ñ¢ & ¬© 2023 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: EFE
title: Nintendo Switch 2 llega con novedades: ¬øCu√°ndo saldr√° a la venta y cu√°l ser√° su precio?
text:
La videoconsola Nintendo Switch 2 saldr√° a la venta el pr√≥ximo 5 de junio, con un precio aproximado de 450 d√≥lares (alrededor de 9 mil pesos mexicanos), anunci√≥ la compa√±√≠a japonesa en un evento virtual.
Nintendo Switch 2 tendr√° una capacidad de almacenamiento de 256 gigas, permitir√° utilizar los juegos de la anterior Nintendo Switch y, entre otras novedades, contar√° con controladores (Joy-con) magn√©ticos, que tambi√©n servir√°n como rat√≥n, y con una nueva funcionalidad: el bot√≥n C.
Este bot√≥n habilitar√° a los jugadores un chat por voz con el resto de usuarios e incluso les dejar√° compartir una especie de videollamada en la que todos se ver√°n las caras en tiempo real mientras juegan.
‚ÄúNintendo Switch 2 no es simplemente una Nintendo Switch mejorada, hemos redise√±ado la consola desde cero y hemos incluido un mont√≥n de nuevas caracter√≠sticas de juego‚Äù, afirm√≥ en la presentaci√≥n Tetsuya Sasaki, director de dise√±o de hardware en Nintendo para la nueva consola.
Adem√°s de la nueva capacidad de la videoconsola (256 gigas, ocho veces m√°s que la anterior), la pantalla pasar√° a ser m√°s grande -de las 6,2 pulgadas de la anterior a las 7,9 pulgadas de la nueva versi√≥n- manteniendo el mismo grosor de 13,9 mil√≠metros; y dispondr√° de dos entradas tipo USB-C.
La pantalla tambi√©n tendr√° el doble de p√≠xeles que la anterior, soportando hasta 120 fotogramas por segundo, y con tecnolog√≠a HDR para mejorar su resoluci√≥n.
Nintendo detall√≥, asimismo, que el nuevo ‚Äòdock‚Äô de la consola -donde se coloca para transmitir la experiencia del formato port√°til a la televisi√≥n- ha sido dise√±ado para poder disfrutarse en calidad de hasta 4K y que contar√° con ventiladores mejorados para evitar sobrecalentamientos.
Lo nuevo del Nintendo Switch 2: ‚ÄòJoy-con‚Äô y Bot√≥n C
Aunque la gran novedad en t√©rminos de hardware son los nuevos controladores (‚ÄòJoy-con‚Äô) y el bot√≥n C, que tambi√©n podr√° silenciar puntualmente nuestra voz; utilizar la opci√≥n de reducci√≥n de ruido; y habilitar esa mencionada videollamada con el resto de jugadores gracias a una c√°mara independiente (la Nintendo Switch 2 camera) conectada por USB-C a la consola.
Los controladores se podr√°n volver a separar, aunque ahora con unos encajes magn√©ticos y no por ra√≠les, y los nuevos ‚Äòsticks‚Äô ser√°n un poco m√°s grandes y servir√°n como rat√≥n. De hecho, para algunas experiencias en videojuegos concretos se podr√° jugar, si se desea, solo utilizando estos.
La consola contar√° tambi√©n con un soporte para usarla de forma port√°til en diferentes √°ngulos permitiendo una experiencia m√°s c√≥moda, y casi como una minipantalla externa o una suerte de tableta, cuando no se quiere conectar a una televisi√≥n pero tampoco jugar con los controladores ajustados a la propia videoconsola.
Nintendo Switch 2 apuesta por compatibilidad de juegos y cl√°sicos
La presentaci√≥n de hoy comenz√≥ con la introducci√≥n de nueva versi√≥n ‚ÄòMario Kart World‚Äô, que llevar√° al usuario a distintas partes del planeta, con una experiencia ‚Äúsujeta a las condiciones meteorol√≥gicas y la hora del d√≠a‚Äù, ya que afectar√°n a los propios escenarios del videojuego, entre otras novedades.
La videoconsola podr√° comprarse el 5 de junio de forma independiente o con un pack de 500 d√≥lares que incluye esta nueva versi√≥n del videojuego.
Hoy el gigante de los videojuegos se apur√≥ por recalcar algo que ya hab√≠a adelantado cuando difundi√≥ los primeros detalles de la nueva consola a mediados de enero: los juegos de la versi√≥n anterior ser√°n compatibles en Nintendo Switch 2.
Tanto en sus formatos digitales como en los f√≠sicos, ya que incluso en apariencia tienen el mismo dise√±o.
Tambi√©n se permitir√° a quienes tengan la Nintendo Switch transferir su datos y configuraciones a la nueva.
Otra de las grandes singularidades de la Switch 2 es su enorme biblioteca de videojuegos digitales originales -tales como ‚ÄòThe Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker‚Äô- que estar√°n disponibles a partir de ahora con el pack Online Plus.
‚ÄúEl pack de expansi√≥n Nintendo Switch Online Plus recibir√° una nueva biblioteca de juegos cl√°sicos exclusiva para Nintendo Switch, entre ellos los de Nintendo GameCube, lanzada originalmente en 2001‚Äù, se detall√≥ en la presentaci√≥n donde se agreg√≥ que habr√° t√≠tulos tambi√©n de Game Boy, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo 64 o Super Nintendo.
Incluso tambi√©n saldr√° a la venta desde el mismo d√≠a un mando morado ic√≥nico de ‚ÄòGameCube‚Äô para exprimir al m√°ximo los juegos cl√°sicos pero que, adem√°s, dispondr√° del nuevo bot√≥n C, y de una entrada de tipo ‚Äòjack‚Äô para otras conexiones.
De la misma forma, Nintendo inform√≥ que con la nueva videoconsola se podr√° jugar contra otro usuario que tambi√©n la tenga -o incluso la Nintendo Switch original- pero usando un solo videojuego a trav√©s de la opci√≥n ‚ÄòGameShare‚Äô.

locations.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker‚Äô-

author: Fidel Rahmati
title: Ban on broadcasting images of living beings expanded to at least 10 provinces in Afghanistan
text:
Reports reveal that the Taliban has expanded its ban on broadcasting images of living beings to at least ten provinces in Afghanistan.
The ban is now enforced in Kandahar, Helmand, Urozgan, Kunar, Khost, Takhar, Badghis, Panjshir, and Laghman.
This prohibition, part of the newly enacted ‚ÄúPromotion of Virtue‚Äù law, prohibits journalists and citizens from filming as well. According to this law, visual media outlets are barred from showing images of living beings.
As per Article 17 of the ‚ÄúPromotion of Virtue and Prevention of Vice‚Äù law, filming living beings or sentient creatures is strictly prohibited.
The Taliban‚Äôs Ministry of Promotion of Virtue and Prevention of Vice, responsible for enforcing this law, has announced plans to gradually implement this ban across all of Afghanistan.
Inspectors from the Ministry are active in all 34 provinces, holding unprecedented authority to impose restrictions on media, women‚Äôs lives, and other citizens. Article 13 of this law defines women‚Äôs voices as ‚Äúimproper‚Äù and instructs women and girls to cover their faces.
In addition to these restrictions, the Taliban‚Äôs policies have severely limited women‚Äôs access to education and employment.
As Afghanistan faces a dire humanitarian crisis, these policies exacerbate the situation, leaving women and girls without opportunities for personal and professional development.
The international community continues to express concern over these developments, emphasizing the need for urgent action to protect the rights and futures of Afghan women and children.

author: redacao@odia.com.br (O Dia)
title: Com alerta de temporal, ruas do centro amanhecem desertas nesta sexta-feira
text:
Rua das Marrecas amanhece sem movimentoReginaldo Pimenta / Ag√™ncia O Dia
A regi√£o da Lapa, que tamb√©m costuma ter movimento, principalmente de turistas, estava completamente deserta na manh√£ desta sexta (22).
Ponto Facultativo
Com um alerta meteorol√≥gico para tempestades em todo o estado do Rio de Janeiro, o Governador Cl√°udio Castro decretou ponto facultativo em todo o Estado do Rio nesta sexta-feira (22). A decis√£o foi anunciada em car√°ter de urg√™ncia no in√≠cio da noite desta quinta (21).
As aulas da rede estadual foram suspensas, e as escolas servir√£o como ponto de apoio para atender a popula√ß√£o.
Al√©m de Castro, diversos munic√≠pios tamb√©m aderiram ao ponto facultativo, como Rio, Niter√≥i, S√£o Gon√ßalo, Queimados, Itagua√≠ e Maric√°.
O Prefeito do Rio, Eduardo Paes, decretou a dispensa dos servi√ßos das reparti√ß√µes p√∫blicas municipais nesta sexta (22). Com isso, o Detran informou que n√£o haver√° expediente nesta sexta. Quem tinha agendamento para hoje, pode voltar em cinco dias √∫teis sem precisar agendar. O mesmo aconteceu com o Tribunal de Justi√ßa do Rio, que suspendeu as atividades e os prazos processuais - no √¢mbito do primeiro e segundo graus - em todo o Estado.
Tempo
O temporal previsto para come√ßar nesta quinta (21) chegou √†s Zonas Norte e Oeste e deve se espalhar nesta sexta-feira (22) por outras regi√µes.
A chuva est√° prevista para chegar na parte da tarde de sexta (22) e deve se estender at√© a noite, com risco de temporal. A temperatura tamb√©m caiu drasticamente. A m√≠nima prevista √© de 20¬∞C e m√°xima de 29¬∞C.
O Corpo de Bombeiros trabalha com efetivo dobrado em regi√µes de maior risco para garantir agilidade no socorro, em caso de necessidade. A recomenda√ß√£o √© que a popula√ß√£o se mantenha em lugares seguros e evitem circular nesta sexta-feira (22).

author: Team Kalkine Media
title: Surge of Australian Tech Stocks Marks Best Year in Three Amidst Wall Street Rally | Kalkine Media
text: In the landscape of Australian technology stocks, the XIJ index has emerged as a standout performer, showcasing a remarkable ascent of 29.5% over the course of this year. This upward trajectory positions the index to clinch its most significant yearly percentage gain since 2020. Outpacing the Benchmark Index As the curtains draw to a close on the fiscal year, the XIJ sub-index stands poised to secure its first yearly gain in three years, painting a vivid contrast against the performance of the benchmark stock index XJO, which posts a more conservative 7.4% rise year-to-date. The robust performance of XIJ can be traced back to its resonance with the formidable gains observed in the tech-laden Nasdaq throughout the year. Global Factors Driving Growth The resurgence in XIJ finds correlation with broader global market dynamics. Factors such as the palpable cooling of U.S. inflation and the prospective conclusion of the Federal Reserve's tightening cycle, coupled with burgeoning rate-cut expectations slated for early 2024, have propelled Wall Street to a surge marked by substantial gains in 2023. Xero (ASX: XRO) Bounces Back Strong Reflecting on individual companies, Xero has rebounded impressively, surging by an astounding 58.8% after experiencing a record percentage fall in the preceding year of 2022. The accounting software company sets its sights on what could potentially be its most prosperous year in the last three years. Link Administration (ASX: LNK) Aims High Post Takeover Offer Link Administration is en route to conclude the year with a commendable over 10% surge, fueled by a substantial AU$1.2 billion ($820.08 million) takeover proposition from Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, a development that transpired earlier this month. WiseTech Global (ASX: WTC) and Tech Innovation WiseTech Global, a tech behemoth that fortified its presence in the U.S. through a $414 million deal this year, is set to culminate the fiscal year with an impressive 48.3% surge, amplifying its market presence significantly. Growth Trail of Megaport (ASX: MP1) and Altium (ASX: ALU) Megaport has witnessed a commendable growth spurt, boasting a 43.1% upswing this year, marking its most significant annual surge since 2019. On a parallel trajectory, Altium exhibited a robust ascent of 32.4%, contributing to the overall buoyancy of the XIJ index. In this narrative of triumphs and resurgence within the Australian technology sector, the XIJ index signifies a resounding success story, reflecting not only the prowess of individual companies but also the collective momentum driving technological innovation and growth in the Australian market. The confluence of global market shifts and company-specific strategies has paved the way for a dynamic and flourishing tech landscape Down Under. Conclusion The tale of XIJ‚Äôs spirited ascent mirrors the resilience and adaptability embedded within Australia‚Äôs tech ecosystem, underscoring the sector's capacity to weather challenges and leap forward amidst global market dynamics.

author: @portalmvd
title: ‚ÄúNo hay ning√∫n cicl√≥n subtropical ac√°‚Äù: la contundente frase del meteor√≥logo Ramis
text:
Montevideo Portal
A diferencia de lo anunciado por el Instituto Uruguayo de Meteorolog√≠a, el metr√≥logo Guillermo Ramis afirm√≥ que ‚Äúno hay ning√∫n cicl√≥n subtropical ac√° en la regi√≥n‚Äù, en referencia al territorio uruguayo, seg√∫n dijo este viernes en Informativo Sarand√≠ (radio Sarand√≠).
‚ÄúLo √∫nico que hay es una pobre depresi√≥n secundaria que roza Rocha, con lluvias. Nada m√°s‚Äù, complet√≥ Ramis. En ese departamento, pueden ocurrir lluvias acumuladas en el entorno de 25 mil√≠metros, y en algunas zonas puntualmente 50 mil√≠metros, aunque seg√∫n se√±al√≥ eso es algo que ocurre ‚Äúnormalmente‚Äù.
‚ÄúNo es para alarmar a nadie ni nada por el estilo. No hay ninguna depresi√≥n sobre Uruguay‚Äù, afirm√≥ tambi√©n. M√°s adelante, en su intervenci√≥n en radio Sarand√≠, Ramis insisti√≥ con que la poblaci√≥n deb√≠a estar tranquila, ya que ‚Äúno hay nada sobre Uruguay‚Äù.
Seg√∫n dijo, en Artigas, Tacuaremb√≥ y Rivera puede haber este viernes ‚Äúalguna pobre c√©lula de tormenta‚Äù, al tiempo que no avizor√≥ grandes precipitaciones para esta jornada en Montevideo y la zona metropolitana.
Consultado, el meteor√≥logo neg√≥ que tanto s√°bado como domingo puedan presentarse tormentas sobre el territorio.
El s√°bado, en tanto, puede presentarse ‚Äúalg√∫n pobre chaparr√≥n en la tarde‚Äù en el sudeste. Esto salvo en Rocha, donde los vol√∫menes de lluvia pueden ser mayores. ‚ÄúPero no estoy viendo nada en la imagen satelital que d√© para alarmarse‚Äù, dijo.
‚ÄúHoy, en Aguada, juegan cicl√≥n y Bigu√°‚Äù, brome√≥ Ramis en un paralelismo con los equipos de b√°squetbol.
[El Instituto Uruguayo de Meteorolog√≠a (Inumet) emiti√≥ un aviso especial para este viernes por tormentas fuertes y posterior ‚Äúformaci√≥n de un cicl√≥n subtropical‚Äù](https://www.montevideo.com.uy/Noticias/Inumet-advierte-por-la-llegada-del-ciclon-Bigua--cuando-seria-y-que-se-espera-que-pase-uc909305). All√≠ se se√±alaba que el cicl√≥n pod√≠a denominarse como Bigu√°, seg√∫n lista de nombres elaborada para ciclones subtropicales y tropicales de la Marinha do Brasil.
A esto tambi√©n se refiri√≥ Ramis. ‚ÄúLos brasile√±os agarraron la costumbre esa de los norteamericanos de nombrar a los ciclones tropicales con nombre de mujer. Ahora los brasile√±os est√°n con lo de que a los ciclones subtropicales le ponen nombre... estamos todos locos. Aparte hay ciclones subtropicales, extratropicales, depresi√≥n frontal, depresi√≥n tropical. Estamos todos locos‚Äù, dijo.
Montevideo Portal
